name: Continuum (itch) (InvictarQ)
description:
[WEBGL - PLAY IN FULLSCREEN |  AND GAME EXPLANATION IS BELOW]

Controls:

Move W-A-S-D SlideCTRL
JumpSPACEAttackLEFT MOUSE

Credits:

Both soundtracks:

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1. I wanted to think of something other than the end of the players life is the beginning of something new, so whenever you end an enemy, your 'vision' or 'experience' has a new beginning. I could have probably thought of a more connecting idea but thats the only thing I could come up with.

Explanation:

Since some people were confused, let me explain how I intend for the game to work. You go through each room and beat up enemies. When they die, you receive their characteristics such as loosing vision, or a colour change as well as your speed, health, jump power and etc. The goal is to get to the purple door, which transports you to the next level.
